title: Historical Revenue Growth Trends of Paycom Software Inc

content.text:
Year 2016: Revenue of $329.8 million
Year 2017: Revenue of $433.1 million
Year 2018: Revenue of $566.4 million
Year 2019: Revenue of $743.8 million
Year 2020: Revenue of $892.8 million

1. Consistent Revenue Growth: The historical data shows that Paycom Software Inc has experienced consistent revenue growth over the years. This indicates a strong business model and market demand for their software solutions.

2. Potential Investment Opportunity: The steady increase in revenue suggests that Paycom Software Inc may continue to perform well in the future. Investors could consider this company as a potential investment opportunity.

3. Stability in Earnings: The consistent revenue growth also indicates the stability of earnings, which can be an attractive factor for income-focused investors.

news.headline: Why Paycom (PAYC) Stock Is Nosediving
news.summary: Shares of online payroll and human resource software provider Paycom (NYSE:PAYC) fell 14% in the morning session after the company reported first-quarter results, with revenue guidance for the next quarter falling below analysts' expectations. In addition, its gross margin decreased. On the other hand, it was good to see Paycom beat analysts' billings expectations this quarter. Overall, this was a mixed quarter for Paycom.

news.summary: Paycom's (PAYC) first-quarter earnings reflect disciplined expenses, along with growing revenues on the back of an expanding customer base and new business wins.

news.headline: Paycom (NYSE:PAYC) Posts Q1 Sales In Line With Estimates But Stock Drops On Weak Q2 Guidance
news.summary: Online payroll and human resource software provider Paycom (NYSE:PAYC) reported results in line with analysts' expectations in Q1 CY2024, with revenue up 10.7% year on year to $499.9 million. On the other hand, next quarter's revenue guidance of $436 million was less impressive, coming in 1.4% below analysts' estimates. It made a non-GAAP profit of $2.59 per share, improving from its profit of $2.46 per share in the same quarter last year.

news.headline: Paycom expands automated payroll with Beti into Ireland
news.summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, May 01, 2024--Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ("Paycom"), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, announced it will expand its product offerings and geographic reach into Ireland. This latest development includes access to Beti®, an industry-first solution that empowers employees to do their own payroll.

news.headline: Paycom Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend
news.summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, April 29, 2024--Paycom Software, Inc. ("Paycom") (NYSE:PAYC), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a cash dividend in the amount of $0.375 per share of common stock, to be paid on June 10, 2024, to all stockholders of record as of the close of business on May 28, 2024.
